content: {"name": "Lucas County Veterans Service Commission", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Pantry: At SeaGate Food Bank, Tuesday & Thursday 1:00pm\nRequired: Call for information and to complete an application.\nServes: for income-eligible honorably-discharged veteran, or their spouse or dependent children", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2595 Arlington Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Glendale-Heatherdowns", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43614", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.6225599, "longitude": -83.6074744}, "phones": [{"number": "(419) 213-6090", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}]}
